biotools.summary: DNA Features Viewer is a Python library to visualize DNA features.  Dna Features Viewer automatically produce simple and clear plots even for sequences with many overlapping features and long labels. The libray plays well with Matplotlib and Biopython, and the plots can be output to many different formats (PNG, JPEG, SVG, PDF), e.g. for report generation, article figures, or LIMS interfaces.
